description: Certificate of Lawfulness for proposed hip to gable end roof extension.
decision_conditions: The dwelling subject of this application is not yet fully built and ready for habitation and does not therefore benefit from permitted development rights on the date of the application.

The works are not permitted development as they fail to meet the criteria in Class B (c), Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as amended, as the hip to gable extension would extend beyond the plane of the roof slope which forms the principal elevation of the dwellinghouse and fronts a highway

The proposal does not clarify whether the materials used will match those used in the house and therefore fails to demonstrate that the proposed development will comply with the limitations set out in B.2 (a), Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as amended
